title: AI in 2025: Where Are We Heading?
content: Artificial intelligence is no longer just a buzzword. In 2025, AI is being used in healthcare diagnostics, personalized education, and environmental protection. However, it also raises ethical concerns such as job displacement and privacy risks. Analysts predict a balance between growth and regulation in the coming years.
